exercises.title: Hello World
exercises.description: Write a program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.

exercises.title: Basic Arithmetic
exercises.description: Create a program that takes two numbers and prints their sum, difference, product, and quotient.
exercises.code:
a = 10
b = 5
print('Sum:', a + b)
print('Difference:', a - b)
print('Product:', a * b)
print('Quotient:', a / b)

exercises.title: Even or Odd
exercises.description: Write a program that checks if a number is even or odd.

exercises.title: List Operations
exercises.description: Create a list of numbers and print the maximum, minimum, and average.
exercises.code:
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
print('Max:', max(numbers))
print('Min:', min(numbers))
print('Average:', sum(numbers) / len(numbers))

exercises.title: Simple Loop
exercises.description: Write a program that prints numbers from 1 to 10 using a loop.

exercises.title: Fibonacci Sequence
exercises.description: Generate the first 10 numbers in the Fibonacci sequence.
exercises.code:
a, b = 0, 1
for _ in range(10):
    print(a)
    a, b = b, a + b
